author: duartej
body:
#### PR description:
This PR is only related with the provisional validator placed at test folder, used to check and validate the 3d digitizer development. There is a fix on the entry angles of the tracks (before using wrong angles) and introduce extra histograms (charge related).

This PR does not affect any class used in the sim/digi chain, only the validator (used only by the developers of the Pixel3D digi)
   * there is no changes in the outputs

@emiglior and @skinnari, as the Phase2 upgrade simulation conveners are aware of this PR.
Adding @suchandradutta 

#### PR validation:
No need to validate anything as the changes only affect a validator not included in any workflow or processing.
title: [Phase2 Pixel3D digitizer] add new histos and fix entry angles for tracks to test beam validator
